resources.string: This fragment demonstrates access to the contact database on the device.\n Clicking \"Add a contact\" adds a new contact named "__DUMMY ENTRY" directly into the database.\n Clicking \"Show first contact\" accesses the contact database to display the name of the first contact.
Camera could not be opened.\nThis occurs when the camera is not available (for example it is already in use) or if the system has denied access (for example when camera access has been disabled).

Click the buttons below to show a camera preview or access the Storage database.\nNote that the Storage option is only available on Android M to illustrate the use of optional, M-only permissions that are not requested on lower SDK platforms.
Camera Permission has been granted. Preview can now be opened.
Storage Permissions have been granted. Storage screen can now be opened.
Camera permission is needed to show the camera preview.
External Storage permissions are needed to demonstrate access.
